import React, {useState} from 'react' import "../styles/SelectBox.css" import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSearch, faFilePdf, faUpload } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from "axios" function SelectBox() { // Gerar QR Code, resolver bug que nÃ£o redireciona ao link correto de download const [wroteMedicine, setWroteMedicine] = useState("") const [medicineData, setMedicineData] = useState([]) const [isFetched, setIsFetched] = useState(false) const [totalElements, setTotalElements] = useState(0) const [QRCodeURL, setQRCodeURL] = useState("") const [downloadArea, setDownloadArea] = useState(false) async function fetchData(){ setWroteMedicine("") setMedicineData([]) setIsFetched(false) setTotalElements(0) const response = await axios.get(`https://bula.vercel.app/pesquisar?nome=${wroteMedicine}&pagina=1`) setTotalElements(response.totalElements) return await response.data.content } const UserMedicine = async() => { const a = await fetchData() setMedicineData(a) setIsFetched(true) setDownloadArea(false) } return (

) } export default SelectBox
